players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie, you are the mafioso. I have evidence to prove it."
Charlie: "Bob is lying, I'm the mafioso. He's trying to distract us from his own guilt."
You: "I am the villager. I didn't kill Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
